reviews.review_content:
Prof Pineda is a great guy, really cool, has great input and also enjoys listening to what his students have to say.  He'll make time to see you after class, and even makes a joke here and there!!  Organized and good lectures although he seems to be a bit hard on himself, many times he would stop midsentence and say, "Umm, I didnt expalin that very well, let me try again."  And he would, so he gets an A for effort in my book.
Workload:
surprise quizzes so do the reading, three short papers and final which was cake.
